## Block.querydetails() method

Performs the query details operation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
querydetails(field?: string): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  field | string | _(Optional)_ Optional parameter specifying the field for which details should be queried. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

A promise that resolves to a boolean indicating the success of the operation.
